_meanings:
{@--2@} A mound of earth
raised to form the foundation of a
building.

{@--3@} A mound of earth
raised from the ditch of a fort.

{@--7@} A
pile of buildings, any edifice.

{@--10@} Arranging or keeping
the sacred fire; <ab>cf.</ab> {#agnicaya#}.

{@--11@} The
amount by which each term 
increases, the common increase or
difference of the terms (in a 
progression).
